Kõigile neile ja veel paljudele teistele küsimustele leiad vastuse sellest südamlikust lastesarjast, mis toob igasse koju vahvaid laule ning mõnusa sooja jõulutuju.

programme.title: Väike nõid Zouk
programme.desc: Pisike nõiatüdruk Zouk elab maailma otsas Väga Suures Linnas ühes väikeses majakeses koos ema-isa ning härra Kõrvitsa ja kass Paharetiga. Pere nagu iga teine… kuigi ausalt öeldes siiski mitte päris! Hea sõbra Jojo seltsis võtab Zouk ette kõiksugu nõiaseiklusi, aga tihtilugu kisub kõik metsa, sest nõidumine ei taha tal veel kuigi hästi õnnestuda... Tänases osas: Zouki ema, kuulus nõid Rohesilm, saab Väga Suure Linna linnapealt võlueliksiiri tellimuse. Paraku on ühe olulise koostisosa varud kodus otsa lõppenud ja et seda hankida, peab Zouk ette võtma pika ning seiklusrikka teekonna.

programme.title: Rebased ja mägrad
programme.desc: Skautmäger otsib oma kadunud kaisukaru, aga otsustab seda teha üksi, sest kardab, et teda hakatakse narrima.

programme.title: Lunnisaar
programme.desc: Oona ja Baba aitavad ühel pisikesel siilipoisil mammat otsida.

programme.title: Vägev värk
programme.sub-title: Miks kassid ühe koha peal nihelevad?

programme.title: Fiksikud
programme.desc: Seljakotis kipuvad asjad segiläbi olema ja midagi kiiresti üles leida on võimatu. Kas lahendus oleks automaatkott või korralik pakkimine?

programme.title: Iidne leping
programme.desc: Fabio pühendab Lyda ja Malte lepingu saladusse... Lastel seisab ees kolm katsumust, et leida lepingu asukoha kaart. Politsei jätkab Viji otsinguid ja kui Emil kuuleb, et katuselt hakatakse jälgi võtma, otsustavad poisid kõik jäljed kaotada.

programme.title: Härra Jänes
programme.desc: Härra Jänes jääb hätta liivalossi tegemisega.

programme.title: NOVA
programme.desc: NOVA topib oma nina sinna, kus on põnevust, uut ja vajalikku, head muusikat ja ägedaid nippe! Kõigele, mis toimub koolis, trennis ja mida muidu vabal ajal ette võtta, annab vastused laste oma saade NOVA! Vaata meid esmaspäevast neljapäevani kas kell 16.45 või 18.45. programme.title: Tinka jõulumuinaslugu
programme.desc: Et välja uurida, kes varastas Jõulutähe, viib Tinka Lasse päkapikkude maale ja nad hiilivad salaja kuninga juurde.

programme.title: Võidu nimel
programme.desc: Sportlased on harjunud füüsilise valuga, seda enamasti ei kardeta. Valu on tippspordi osa ja öeldakse isegi, et kui oled suuteline endale valu tegema, tähendab see tippspordis sageli midagi head. 3. osas räägivad Eesti tippsportlased isiklikest valukogemustest. Saate autor Kristjan Kalkun.

programme.title: Londoni hotell Ritz
programme.desc: Inimesed kulutavad üha vähem ja aina rohkem avatakse luksuslikke hotelle. Mille poolest paistab silma üks maailma traditsioonilisem ja uhkeim hotell? Hotell Ritz avab oma uksed. Täna näeme, kuidas teiste hulgas külastavad hotelli näitleja Richard E. Grant, toimetaja Anna Wintour ja jalgpallur Mohamed Salah. Jälgime, kuidas peakokk John Williams valmistub välja andma esimest kokaraamatut, milles on hotell Ritzi kõige kuulsamad retseptid. Tähistatakse ülemportjee Michael De Cozar 46. hotellis töötamise aastapäeva.

programme.title: Kaduva maailma lävel
programme.desc: Eesti merevetes elab kaks hüljest - hallhüljes ja viigerhüljes. Hülgeuurija Ivar Jüssi räägib viigrist, kes on hallhülgest väiksem ja lühema koonuga. Veel möödunud sajandi 70ndatel ja 80ndatel räsisid Läänemere hüljeste ridu keskkonnamürgid, mistõttu olid kohati lausa 80% viigritest sigimisvõimetud. Üha sagenenud soojad talved kujutavad aga hüljestele teistmoodi ohtu: järglaste ilmaletoomiseks pole enam jääd. Soojade talvede sagenedes satuvad viigrid meie piirkonnas väljasuremisohtu.

programme.title: Eesti lood
Põlvkond piiri taga
programme.desc: Filmi keskmes on põlvkond, kes astus ellu pärast Eesti liitumist Euroopa Liiduga ja otsustas minna välismaale tööle, õppima või lihtsalt maailma avastama. Ent aastaid hiljem pole Eestisse tagasi pöördumine sama lihtne. Tihti terendavad uues elukohas atraktiivsed karjääriperspektiivid ja paremad elutingimused ning on tekkinud olulised lähedased suhted. Inimesed armuvad ja abielluvad, leiavad uusi mugavustsoone ning viise, kuidas neist jälle välja astuda. „Põlvkond piiri taga” toob vaatajani loo värvikate elusaatustega maailma eri paigus elavatest eestlastest, kes ausalt ja avatult jagavad oma isiklikke lugusid, mõtteid ja tundeid seoses rände, kuuluvuse ja juurtega. Režissöör ja stsenarist Terje Toomistu, operaatorid Aivo Rannik ja Aleksandr Heifets, montaažirežissöör Madli Lääne, helirežissöör Indrek Soe, produtsent Terje Toomistu. Tootja Cece OÜ.

programme.title: Tundmatu kunstniku töö
One Last Deal
programme.desc: Vanaldane kunstikaupmees Olavi näeb oksjonil üht vana maali. Tal tekib kahtlus, et maal on määratud alghinnast palju väärtuslikum, ja ta otsustab sõlmida viimase tehingu, et kindlustada endale korralik pensionifond. Nii hakkab ta koos teismelise tütrepoja Ottoga maali tausta uurima ja on sunnitud seisma silmitsi nii oma minevikuvigadega kui ka vägeva oksjonimajaga.

programme.title: Vulkaani meelevallas
Countdown to Disaster: White Island Eruption
programme.desc: 2019. aastal hakkas ootamatult purskama vulkaan Uus-Meremaa Valgesaarel/Whakaaril, mis võttis 22 inimese elu. Filmi aluseks on tõestisündinud lugu kahest noorest kopteripiloodist, kes lendasid politsei korraldusi eirates kohe pärast plahvatust vulkaanisaarele turiste päästma.

programme.title: Ma olen Jackie O
I am Jackie O
programme.desc: Jacqueline Bouvier Kennedy Onassis - Ameerika moe- ja kultuuriikoon, glamuurne esimene leedi tõi 1960. aastatel Valgesse Majja noorusliku elegantsi ja vallutas südameid oma ilu ning südikusega. Dokumentaalfilm loob arhiivimaterjalide ning intervjuude abil inimliku ja intiimse portree noore naise, ema ning abikaasa elust võimuladviku tipus, lohutamatust leinast ja privaatsuse otsimisest pärast abikaasa mõrva, kuni ta lõpuks võimsate meeste varjust välja astudes ise oma elule sisu annab.

programme.title: Susapusa Okidos
programme.desc: Kogu Okido magab ööl enne Jõuluema saabumist. Ainult Susapusa ja ta sõbrad ei kannata oodata ning ajavad Jõuluema üles enne, kui ta on oma une täis maganud. Mis siis juhtub kingitustega ja miks me vajame und, sellest räägib Susapusa järjekordne seiklus.

programme.sub-title: Me juttudest läbi. Mairo Libba, Katri Kade ja Külliki Lauluaed

programme.title: Iidne leping

programme.title: muusikavideod ETV2

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Marko Reikop ja Anna Pihl.

programme.title: Doktor Thorne
programme.desc: Doktor Thomas Thorne ja tema kaunis vennatütar elavad Barsetshire’is Greshamsbury külas. Mary Thorne kasvas koos Greshami õdede ja nende nägusa venna Frankiga. Kui dr Thorne’i vaest vennatütart Maryt ei kutsuta lapsepõlve mängukaaslase pulma, nõuab ta, et onu räägiks tema sünniloost tõtt. Neiu on vapustatud, kuuldes, et a on dr Thorne’i kadunud venna vallaslaps, kel pole ei head päritolu ega ka varandust. Mary on armunud Greshamsbury mõisa pärijasse Franki, kuid Franki ema, leedi Arabella, soovib panna poja paari rikka Ameerika pärijannaga.

programme.title: Restoran 0
programme.desc: Restorani avamiseni on jäänud veel vaid üks päev. Viimased ettevalmistused käivad ja loomulikult jääb ajast natuke puudu. Avatakse pikalt valminud söögilaud, valmistatakse suppi ja tehakse viimistlustöid. Kes katab laua? Kes valab veini? Paljud vastuseta küsimused on ootamatult õhus ja vajavad kiireid lahendusi. Saatejuhid Ott Tomik, Märt Metsallik ja Hannes Praks. Režissöör Mikk Jürjens, produtsent Eero Reinu.

programme.title: Eesti lipp Mustale merele
programme.desc: Testime Bakuus kohalikke maitseid, taaslavastame filmiklassikat ja teeme vaibakaupa. Tulekummardajate tempel ja igavesti põlev sein. Kohtume härra Fikratiga, kes viib meid tutvuma aserite külaelu ja kommetega ning maitseme suppi nimega hašš. Saate autor ja režissöör Lemo, tootja Tootmisguru OÜ.

programme.title: Lahutus Eesti moodi
programme.desc: Aksel ja Laura on kriisi seljatanud, aga juba triivivad uued pilved abieluplaani kohal, kui Laura avastab, et Akslil on salajane kohting noore naisrežissööriga. Samal ajal tuleb Mirjam tagasi ja otsustab Taunole uue võimaluse anda. Teraapiaülesanne keskendub aga värvikale eelmängule, mis ootamatult Aksli töösuhted ohtu seab. Stsenarist Martin Algus, režissöör Ergo Kuld, tootja Kassikuld OÜ.

programme.title: Areeni varjus
programme.desc: Leedu korvpallitähe Arvydas Sabonise ja Tiit Soku pilguheit olümpiakulla võitmisele Nõukogude Liidu koondises. Martin Müürsepa tagasivaade õppetundidele maailma kõige tugevamas korvpalliliigas Ameerikas. Olulist rolli täidab ka treener, kes sportlase iseloomu karastab ja meeskonna ühiseks löögirusikaks liidab. Sageli lahutab võitjat ja kaotajat juuspeen vahe ning siis saab otsustavaks see, kellel on tugevam vaim. Alistumatu meele suurepäraseks eeskujuks on kahekordne olümpiavõitja Kristina Šmigun. Saate tegid Ken Saan, Andrus Nilk, Taavi Aavik.

programme.title: Jõulutaadi suured saladused
programme.sub-title: Kust on pärit komme jõulukuuske ehtida?
programme.desc: Mis sa arvad, kuidas ikkagi jõuab jõuluvana üheainsa õhtu jooksul kõigi maailma laste juurde kinke jagama? Mitu põhjapõtra on tema saani ees ja mitu päkapikust abilist elab tema võlulossis kaugel lumises Põhjalas? Ja kas jõulutaat vahel puhkusel ka käib? programme.title: Võidu nimel
programme.desc: Et tunda võistlustest rõõmu, on sportlased valmis koormusi kannatama. Kuid rõõmu on kahesugust - üks tuleb sisemusest ja on tõeline, rahva rõõm on aga teistpidi tore tagajärg edukale võistlusele. Saatesarja 4. osas peegeldavad Eesti tippsportlased isiklikke rõõmukogemusi. Saate autor Kristjan Kalkun.

programme.title: Imeline Maa
programme.desc: Meie planeet võib pakkuda kõige erakordsemaid vaatemänge küütlevatest virmalistest rajude äikesetormide ja lahvatavate vulkaanideni. Selleks, et nende põgusate hetkede ilu jäädvustada, peab olema õigel ajal õiges kohas. Esimeses osas on kartmatu rühma sihiks üks kõige kaunimaid ja hirmutavamaid nähtusi - välk.

programme.title: MI
programme.desc: Peedu Kass hoiab bassiliini paljudes Eesti ja rahvusvahelistes muusikakollektiivides, vastukaaluks turnib mees mägedel. Kui tosin ja pool aastat profimuusiku karjääri algusest möödas, siis kuhu on jõutud muusikuna, inimesena? Mis viib edasi? Ja veel üks mitmemõõtmeline küsimus - mida annaks parandada? Autor Timo Steiner, režissöör Ülle Õun.

programme.title: Üleminekuaken
programme.desc: Noor jalgpalli imelaps Jordan Burnett ei tea midagi jalgpallimaailma kulisside taga toimuvatest julmadest mängudest. Jordani agendist vend Kieran tõrjutakse halastamatult kõrvale, et vahendeid valimata Jordani allkiri lepingule kätte saada.

programme.title: Üleminekuaken
programme.desc: Kui tundmatu kurjategija sõidab otsa jalgpalliagent Romulus Daglisele ja põgeneb, peab politsei kahtlustatavana kinni Kierani. Paraku tuleb süüdlast otsida mujalt ja Romulus mõistab, et Jordani esindamiseks peab ta kampa võtma ka tema venna Kierani.

programme.title: Aalto
programme.desc: "Aalto" jutustab Alvar ja Aino Aalto loo, kes olid partnerid nii elus kui ka töös. Üheskoos püüdsid nad luua paremat ja demokraatlikumat kaasaegset maailma. Heidame pilgu Alvar Aalto loomeprotsessile ja külastame tema projekteeritud hooneid Soomes ning üle maailma, sealhulgas Paimio sanatooriumi, Viiburi raamatukogu ja tudengite ühiselamut MITis. Loomulikult tuleb juttu Aalto disainitud mööblist. Alvar Aalto oli hea suhtleja ja sõlmis kergesti sõprussidemeid. Tema heade tuttavate hulka kuulusid teiste seas Rockefellerid, Le Corbusier ja László Moholy-Nagy.(n)

programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Marko Reikop ja Anna Pihl.(n)

programme.title: Doktor Thorne
programme.desc: Sir Roger Scatcherd võidab valimistel, kuid peab heitma haigevoodisse. Dr Thorne ei saa tema elu pikendamiseks enam midagi teha. Sir Rogeri poeg Louis armub Marysse. Preili Dunstable annab Frankile nõu jääda Maryle truuks perekonna survest hoolimata.(n)

programme.title: Restoran 0
programme.desc: Restoran 0 avab viimaks oma uksed. Avamispäev on palavikuline toimetamine nii kokkadele kui ka disainitiimile, kes leiab end ühtäkki teenindajate rollis. Midagi pole teha: rahvale on lubatud uksed avada ja saab kõik valmis või ei saa, lauad kaetakse ning hullumeelne idee ehitada nädalaga restoran saabki teoks! Saatejuhid Ott Tomik, Märt Metsallik ja Hannes Praks. Režissöör Mikk Jürjens, produtsent Eero Reinu.(n)

programme.title: Eesti lipp Mustale merele
programme.desc: Lahkume lahkelt aseritemaalt ja jõuame Georgiasse. Enne seda täname Fikrati vastuvõtu eest ja külastame tema pudulojuseid. Järjekordsed kannatused piiril. Mitmetahuline Tbilisi, kus õhtu lõpetuseks lähevad härrad hamammi. Saate autor ja režissöör Lemo, tootja Tootmisguru OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Lahutus Eesti moodi
programme.desc: Tauno rahakraanide sulgumine seab Aksli ja Laura pulmaplaanid uuesti ohtu. Tagasi tulnud Mirjam peab nüüd selgusele jõudma, kas ta tahab elada ka vaese Taunoga. Laural tuleb koos enda uue pagaripoisiga idee, kuidas salakavalale konkurendile ära teha – Richard nõuab Lauralt ühte romantilist ööd hotellis, et siis naise pagariäri rahule jätta. Laura otsustab pagaripoiss Däni abiga mehele lõksu seada ja asjad võtavad nüüd täiesti pöörase pöörde. Stsenarist Martin Algus, režissöör Ergo Kuld, tootja Kassikuld OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Õnne kalossid
Die Galoschen des Glücks
programme.desc: Muinasjutufilm Hans Christian Anderseni muinasjutu ainetel. Suurhertsoginna Ottilie laseb korraldada oma noore sugulase printsess Aurora sünnipäevapeo. Köögis on palju tegemist, kokkadel proua Rõõmul ja proua Murel on abiks kokapoiss Johann. Viimane ihkab ise olla kõrgemas seltskonnas, eriti veel siis, kui armub esimesest pilgust kaunisse printsessi. Ootamatult ta soov täitubki, sest proua Rõõm ja proua Mure on tegelikult haldjad, kelle võlukalossid muudavad Johanni prints Ludwigiks. Nüüd peab noormees veel peeni kombeid õppima ja siis ehk õnnestubki printsess Auroraga kihluda. Haldjate plaan siiski nii lihtsalt ei edene, sest Johanni igatseb taga kammerneitsi Lisbeth ja ajapikku ilmneb, et kaunis printsess on õige tujukas. Kas Johann taipab lõpuks, kust ta tegelikult oma õnne leiab?(n)

programme.title: Tinka jõulumuinaslugu
programme.desc: Nillel õnnestub lapsed kuninga juurde sokutada. Lossis näevad nad midagi, mida kindlasti näha ei oleks tohtinud.(n)

programme.title: Jõulutaadi suured saladused
programme.desc: Mis sa arvad, kuidas ikkagi jõuab jõuluvana üheainsa õhtu jooksul kõigi maailma laste juurde kinke jagama? programme.title: Jalgpalli MM 2022
programme.desc: Kommenteerivad Joel-Rasmus Remmel ja Markus Jürgenson.(n)

programme.title: Võidu nimel
programme.desc: Tippsportlased on edevad eelkõige seetõttu, et neis on suur isiklik tõestamisvajadus. Samas tunnistatakse, et ei vajata kuulsust. Kuidas tulla toime avaliku tähelepanu, tunnustuse ja kriitikaga? Sellest räägivad sarja 5. osas Eesti tippsportlased. Saate autor Kristjan Kalkun.(n)

programme.title: Jalgpallistuudio
programme.desc: Jalgpallistuudio aitab MM-finaalturniiri mängude eel häälestuda eelseisva kohtumise lainele. Eesti parimad jalgpallieksperdid vaagivad meeskondade võimalusi ja pakuvad põnevat kaasamõtlemist.(n)

programme.title: Jalgpalli MM 2022
programme.desc: Kommenteerivad Tarmo Tiisler ja Marti Pähn.(n)

programme.title: Happy Death Day
programme.desc: A college student must relive the day of her murder over and over again, in a loop that will only end when she discovers her murderer's identity.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: When (Chris Brander) decides to take the next step in his relationship with (Jamie), but she only wants them to be friends, he goes to Los Angeles and becomes an attractive guy who works in the music industry. He travels with a new singer (Samantha) till he returns to his home town.

programme.title: The In-Laws
programme.desc: The life of the mild-mannered foot doctor Jerry Peyser takes a surprising turn when he finds out that his daughter's future father-in-law is an undercover agent for the CIA, who's in the middle of a secret operation that Jerry unwittingly gets dragged into.

programme.title: Home of the Brave
programme.desc: Four vets struggle to adjust to civilian life after they return from a tour in Iraq. Haunted by what they have seen and what they have done, their psychological scars might be even harder to heal than their physical ones.

programme.title: Serious Moonlight
programme.desc: Hoping to give her failing marriage a boost, Louise goes to her husband's country cottage to surprise him, only to find out he has decorated the cottage in the reception of his girlfriend. Things get out of hand when Louise rejects his proposal of divorce, while the girlfriend and a burglar show up.

programme.title: Here Comes the Boom
programme.desc: A high school is facing a US$ 48,000 budget deficit and announces cuts to all extra-curricular activities. Scott Voss, a 42 year-old Biology teacher, and former college wrestler, decides to prevent this disaster by raising funds through moonlighting (having a second night job) as a mixed martial arts fighter. This makes him a sensation that rallies the entire school and impresses nurse Bella.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: A couple’s world turns upside down when they foster three children.

programme.title: The King of Staten Island
programme.desc: Having developed a state of arrested development following his father's death, Scott's coping mechanism has been smoking weed and daydreaming about the day he will become a tattoo artist. Until tragic revelations and new events force him to contend with his heritage of trauma and move on.

programme.title: Poms
programme.desc: When the fatally-ill Martha moves into a retirement community to spend her last days in peace, the last thing she expects is for her fun-loving neighbor to convince her that there's still time to revive her old dream of being a cheerleader.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: A couple’s world turns upside down when they foster three children.

programme.title: Here Comes the Boom
programme.desc: A high school is facing a US$ 48,000 budget deficit and announces cuts to all extra-curricular activities. Scott Voss, a 42 year-old Biology teacher, and former college wrestler, decides to prevent this disaster by raising funds through moonlighting (having a second night job) as a mixed martial arts fighter. This makes him a sensation that rallies the entire school and impresses nurse Bella.

programme.title: The Impossible
programme.desc: A young British family vacationing in Thailand is suddenly torn apart when the devastating 2004 tsunami tears through their seaside resort. Their devoted search for one another is a testament to the human spirit and the power of family.

programme.title: xXx
programme.desc: When NSA Agent Augustus Gibbons recruits Xander Cage, an extreme sports athlete, on a special mission, Cage finds himself obliged to find a way to combat a ruthless enemy.

programme.title: xXx: State of the Union
programme.desc: (Darius Stone), a new agent for xXx program, is sent to Washington DC to defuse the power struggle between national leaders.

programme.title: xXx: The Return of Xander Cage
programme.desc: Xander Cage returns after self-imposed exile leaving an impression that he was long dead. He secretly works with his handler, Augustus Gibbons, and his team to recover a sinister and seemingly unstoppable weapon known as Pandora's box.

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: United Nations employee, Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt), must leave his family and traverse the world in a race against time to stop a Zombie pandemic that is crumbling armies and governments in its wake.

programme.title: Land of the Dead
programme.desc: In a world taken over by the living dead, the remaining survivors live in a walled city under troubling leadership. Riley, who commands an armored vehicle to protect the city, faces the challenge of investigating the zombies turning into more advanced creatures as a revolution brews in the city.

programme.title: The King of Staten Island
programme.desc: Having developed a state of arrested development following his father's death, Scott's coping mechanism has been smoking weed and daydreaming about the day he will become a tattoo artist. Until tragic revelations and new events force him to contend with his heritage of trauma and move on.

programme.title: Room
programme.desc: The film tells the story of Jack (Tremblay), a boy at the age of 5 years, who lives in his mother's love and sincere care (Larsson) which is developed in unusual circumstances, where the two of them are trapped in a place does not exceed an area of only a few meters, which refers by his mother to the word (The Room), where Jack's mother has created a parallel universe inside it, but curiosity began to grow inside (Jack) about everything surrounding him, whereupon he develops a risky plan to escape this universe.

programme.title: Me Before You
programme.desc: The story centers around a young woman working in a convenience store lived her life that she knows by counting the number of the steps to the bus stop down to the difficulty of accepting the love of her friend (Patrick). Unexpectedly she gets fired from work, while on the other side, a motorcycle accident occurred to the young (Will Traynor) prevent him from doing whatever he used in the past, consequently, their paths crosses, which results in making their lives happier and delighted.

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: In Hawaii, a military contractor relives his glory days at the site of his greatest achievement. But his return to the island stirs up past memories with his former girlfriend, which makes his new feeling for his Air Force liaison more complicated.

programme.title: Five Feet Apart
programme.desc: Stella is a cystic fibrosis patient who spends her days in the hospital, without anything exciting about her life, until she meets the rebellious Will who suffers from the same illness and they both change each other's lives.

programme.title: Chef
programme.desc: Professional chef Carl (Jon Favreau) quits his job at a popular Los Angeles restaurant and returns to his home town of Miami to fix up a food truck. He reconnects with his ex-wife (Sofía Vergara) and invites their young son to join him in driving the truck back to L.A.

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: A Women lives near-perfect life: marriage is great, children precede her age, home of breathtaking view, but the progress of her career is frustrating, even though she works double effort, and highly committed, with all the frustrations she faces, she is about to reach the point of explosion, which get her forming an alliance with a group of other mothers to overcome all their routine lives.

programme.title: A Bad Moms Christmas
programme.desc: Amy, Kiki, and Carla are three under-appreciated and over-burdened mothers who are trying to cope with their lives when their scary mothers come to visit them for Christmas, bringing the three of them into a new challenge to celebrate Christmas the way they prefer.

programme.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
programme.desc: Audrey and Morgan, are two best friends in their thirties who unwittingly become entangled in an international conspiracy when Audery's ex-boyfriend suddenly shows up at their apartment with a team of deadly assassins on his trail.

programme.title: The Hustle
programme.desc: A remake of the 1988 “Dirty little scoundrels”, starring Anne Hathaway and Rebel Wilson as two scam artist trying their best shot at conning a filthy rich Tech wonder.

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director falls for a prostitute-turned-actress and decides to professionally adopt her, while she in turn is having another affair simultaneously with the writer of the play they're working on.

programme.title: The Hustle
programme.desc: A remake of the 1988 “Dirty little scoundrels”, starring Anne Hathaway and Rebel Wilson as two scam artist trying their best shot at conning a filthy rich Tech wonder.

programme.title: Serena
programme.desc: Set in 1929 North Carolina, newlyweds George and Serena Pemberton arrive to build a timber empire. Their ambition is all-consuming and dangerous, but they're turned against each other when Serena launches a deadly vendetta against her husband's illegitimate son.

programme.title: A United Kingdom
programme.desc: Based on true events, the film revolves around Prince Seretse Khama of Botswana (David Oyelowo), who caused a strong international uproar; when he married a white woman from London, Ruth Williams (Rosamund Pike), in the late 1940s.

programme.title: Café Society
programme.desc: This is a love story about making choices at a time of uncertainty. When the Bronx native Bobby arrives to Hollywood, hoping to start a career in the film industry, he crosses paths with a lovely woman who just happens to be seeing a married man. Where does this leave them.

programme.title: On Chesil Beach
programme.desc: The events take place during the summer of 1962 about a young couple from very different social backgrounds. Following them in their idyllic courtship,the film explores sex and the societal pressure that can accompany physical intimacy, leading to an awkward and fateful wedding night.

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: A lighthouse keeper and his wife living off the coast of Western Australia, find a baby in a lifeboat. After they adopt the child, they learn later that a boat accident occurred at the same time they found the child and a woman tells them that she lost her husband and her child that day.

Lucinda Embry, places in the capsule a page that is full of unknown numbers. Fifty years later, in 2009, the time capsule is opened and a page of numbers and John Kestler realizes that the it represents numbers of actual disasters.(n)

programme.title: Premium Rush
programme.desc: Wilee is a bike courier in Manhattan. On this day, Wilee has a delivery that attracts the interest of a NYC detective, who starts to chase him in the streets of Manhattan.(n)

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.(n)

programme.title: Taken 2
programme.desc: The past comes back to haunt former CIA operative Bryan Mills when the father of one of the kidnappers he killed to rescue his daughter Kim comes after him and his family. programme.title: Taken 3
programme.desc: Ex-government operative Bryan Mills finds his life shattered when he's falsely accused of a murder that hits close to home. As he's pursued by a savvy police inspector, Mills employs his particular set of skills to track the real killer and exact his unique brand of justice.(n)

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: The movie revolves around a security guard who is facing financial problems; forcing him back into doing what he does best-running a contraband with his partner.(n)

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A mission to protect a young woman from an evil gang turns into something more when Special Forces agent Lin learns that his missing daughter has become the recipient of a bio-chemical invention, sending him on a quest that uncovers a wider conspiracy.(n)

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.(n)

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: United Nations employee, Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt), must leave his family and traverse the world in a race against time to stop a Zombie pandemic that is crumbling armies and governments in its wake.(n)

programme.title: Empire State
programme.desc: Based on true events, Chris Potatmitis settles for a security guard job at the Empire State Armored Truck Company after he disqualifies at the Police Academy. He mentions their faulty processes to his best friend, Eddie, and unexpectedly becomes part of an eleven million dollar heist. The police, and local crime bosses who are angered by their unapproved work in their turf, are now after them.(n)

programme.title: The Tourist
programme.desc: An unwitting American tourist named Frank finds himself in the midst of an intense pursuit that involves various European police forces and a gang of Belarusians among other parties. A seemingly minor error causes Frank to be mistaken for a man wanted by law authorities and mafia men alike.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: Ex-con Dom Toretto and FBI agent, Brian O'Connor, must put aside their feuds and team up to take down a heroin importer.(n)

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A mission to protect a young woman from an evil gang turns into something more when Special Forces agent Lin learns that his missing daughter has become the recipient of a bio-chemical invention, sending him on a quest that uncovers a wider conspiracy.(n)

programme.title: Mr & Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: A married couple going through marriage counseling discover that they are both assassins working for competing agencies when they are charged with killing each other.(n)

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: June Havens meets Secret Agent Miller, at the airport by accident. She gets involved with him in a secret operation to protect an energy source that holds the key to infinite power. Things get more complicated when Miller's enemies tell June that Miller suffers from a nervous breakdown.(n)

programme.title: Fast Five
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto and his crew find themselves on the wrong side of the law once again as they plan a heist to buy their freedom while being watched by a ruthless drug lord and a relentless federal agent.(n)

programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: Two cops partner up in order to uncover how a group of bank robbers managed to escape from a bank during a heist that apparently has other motives than just stealing money.(n)

programme.title: Navy Seals
programme.desc: During a rescue mission, Navy Lieutenant Curran learns that things are more complicated than he thought, as the terrorists he and his team are up against have gotten nuclear weapons.(n)

programme.title: Robocop 2
programme.desc: The Detroit Police are being attacked, while the conglomerate that runs the police (OCP) is developing a new robot to replace Robocop. Meanwhile, a group of criminals led by Cane are discovering a new drug. It becomes imperative for RoboCop and his partner Anne to fight back.(n)

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: On the eve of the fall of the Berlin wall, spy Lorraine Broughton goes on a mission to bring down the spy network that killed an undercover agent for an unknown reason.(n)

programme.title: Pain & Gain
programme.desc: A trio of bodybuilders in Florida gets caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.(n)

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: CIA operative Tom Bishop asks the retired Nathan Muir to help him when he is arrested in China. While on this mission, Nathan recalls all the situations that affected his and Tom's relationship.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: In the fourth Jason Bourne feature film, a unique agent, Aaron Cross, is enrolled in an enhanced US Defense Department black ops program "Operation Outcome". Agents are given chemical pills to genetically amplify their abilities. After the older programs are publicly exposed, CIA directors are investigated followed by a decision to shut down Outcome and eliminate all its agents and scientists.(n)

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: With the aid of a technology that gives him access to his ancestors' memories through genetics, Callum takes a dive into the memories of his ancestor Aguilar, a member of the Assassins, to figure out a way to prevent the Templars from stripping people of their free will.(n)

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: Federal agent Hobbs (Dwayne Johnson) enlists the aid of Dom (Vin Diesel) and his crew to bring a criminal mastermind Shaw (Luke Evans) and his gang to justice. In exchange for full pardons, they must put an end to their schemes, no matter how personal the cost.(n)

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: Detective Jack Mosley, who is an alcoholic, is assigned a last minute mission after a hard day's work. The mission is to escort a witness 16 blocks from the police station to the courthouse, but he discovers that several people want the witness dead, and Jack is faced with an unlikely situation where he has to choose between his duty and his loyalty to his police officer colleagues.(n)

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle Of Life
programme.desc: The British Intelligence recruits archaeologist Lara Croft on a mission to get to Pandora's box, which has the most dangerous disease known to mankind. Evil scientist Jonathan has his sights set on the box as well, and Lara Croft agrees to face him on the condition that the Intelligence release the man she is in a relationship with.(n)

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: Frankenstein's monster becomes involved in an ancient war between two immortal clans of demons and gargoyles.(n)

programme.title: The Dogs of War
programme.desc: Jamie Shannon is hired by a British businessman along with other mercenaries to rob the people of Zangaro of their fortunes. However, their intentions change when they arrive there.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: After becoming an outcast following the aftermath of Harvey Dent's death, Bruce Wayne's resumes his role as the caped crusader who must defend Gotham City from Bane's plan of nuclear destruction.(n)

programme.title: Due Date
programme.desc: Peter Highman (Robert Downey Jr.) is expecting the birth of his first baby in 5 days. On his way home from Atlanta, he loses his wallet and therefore is not allowed to board the plane. In order not to miss the birth of his son, he must accept a ride cross country with Ethan Tremblay (Zach Galifianakis). Chaos ensues as the two men with nothing in common drive each other crazy.

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore
programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.

programme.desc: When his African-American daughter is brutally raped by two white men in Mississippi, Carl decides to seek revenge by killing the culprits himself. As the young lawyer Jake takes Carl's case, he faces prejudice and violence from members of the Ku Klux Klan.

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore
programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Faded professional wrestler Randy 'The Ram' Robinson struggles to adjust to life outside the wrestling ring, as he juggles with keeping a small time job, mending his relationship with his estranged daughter and bonding with a stripper.

programme.title: Shadow Dancer
programme.desc: In 1993, the IRA member Colette is arrested and a deal is made for her to work for the MI-5 as an informer. She accepts to protect her son but it not that simple as other tasks are asked by different officers.(n)

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore
programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.(n)

programme.title: Gully
programme.desc: Set in the dystopian LA, we follow, during the course of 48 hours, the uneven lives of Joyce, Nicky and Calvin, as they venture into an intractable drugs and murder rampage across the city that turns into retaliation.

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: A divorced father and his ex-con brother start a series of bank robberies to keep their family's ranch in West Texas, while two Texas Rangers try to catch them.

programme.title: Heat
programme.desc: A talented thief and his crew find themselves in hot water when their latest heist goes wrong and they leave behind a clue that puts Lt. Vincent Hanna and his team of investigators on their tail.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: The young hobbit, Frodo from the Shire finds himself tasked with destroying the powerful One Ring, by forming a Fellowship of eight companions and together they go on an epic journey to save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: Sam and Frodo reluctantly accept Gollum's help after they get lost in the mountains. The rest of the fellowship try to break Saruman's spell on Theoden, the king of Rohan.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a remote town near the edge of the magical land, Tristan promises his beloved that he will search for a fallen star for her, embarking on a journey of magical adventures in the process.

programme.title: Birdman
programme.desc: Riggan Thomson is an actor with diminishing fame who once played an iconic superhero, he struggles to launch a Broadway play he wrote and wants to direct, while clashing with his family, his career and himself.

programme.title: Green Book
programme.desc: In 1962, Tony "Tony Lip” (Viggo Mortensen), an Italian-American tough bouncer, is hired to be the driver for the African-American classical pianist Dr. Don Shirley (Mahershala Ali) for a concert tour into the Deep South states. Because of America's racial segregation, Shirley relies on The Negro Motorist Green Book to guide them to small hotels, restaurants and gas stations. As the disparate pair witness and endure America's appalling injustices on the road, they find a newfound respect for each that opens their eyes to the world around them.

programme.title: The Lincoln Lawyer
programme.desc: A famous lawyer, Mickey Haller, defends complex criminal cases in Los Angeles. Mickey runs the business his own way in his Lincoln, which tells that his business made him rich. Haller finds himself involved in the defense of the son of a wealthy businessman “Louis Roulet”, accused for rape and murder. A major conflict makes Haller not convinced of his client’s innocence. The lawyer turns into the investigator and opposes many influential persons’ attempts to mislead justice.

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: On the occasion of his fifth wedding anniversary, Nick Dunne reports that his wife, Amy, has gone missing. Under pressure from the police and a growing media frenzy, Nick's portrait of a blissful union begins to crumble. Soon his lies, deceits and strange behavior have everyone asking the same dark question: Did Nick Dunne kill his wife.

programme.title: Black Swan
programme.desc: Nina Sayers is a ballerina whose dedication to playing a dual role in Tchaikovsky's "Swan Lake" starts to threaten her mental health as she starts having hallucinations.

programme.title: Birdman
programme.desc: Riggan Thomson is an actor with diminishing fame who once played an iconic superhero, he struggles to launch a Broadway play he wrote and wants to direct, while clashing with his family, his career and himself.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
programme.desc: Ignorant of Gollum's true intentions, Sam and Frodo follow him to Mount Doom to dispose of the One Ring, as the rest of the fellowship prepares for battle Sauron's armies at Gondor.

programme.title: Gold
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the movie revolves around Kenny Wells and Michael Acosta, two friends who set off on an adventure in the uncharted jungle of Indonesia in the hopes of finding gold.

programme.title: Jungleland
programme.desc: A boxer travels with his brother, who is managing him, for a final boxing match. But when an unexpected travel companion joins them, truths and cracks in the two brothers' relationship come to the surface.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: During its maiden voyage in the North Atlantic in 1961, Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions, and it's up to Captain Alexei Vostrikov and Officer Mikhail Polenin to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: Edward is under pressure and is unable to sleep, but finds some peace in group psychotherapy sessions. He meets Tyler Durden who frees him from his fear of people and together they create a fight club that attracts many frustrated men, who take out their anger and hatred for the world in fighting.

programme.title: Child 44
programme.desc: In 1950s Soviet Russia, secret police agent Leo Demidov is exiled with his wife to a remote province where they join forces with Gen. Mikhail Nesterov to investigate the case of a serial killer who kills young boys, and in their quest reveals horrific secrets related to the political system itself.

programme.title: Jungleland

programme.desc: The funny mishaps in the jingle writer's Charlie Harper Malibu beach house continue, as he's always clashing with his younger brother Alan, who's living with him along with his son Jake.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3
programme.desc: Penny, a pretty woman coming from Omaha to California as an aspiring actress. She moves into the apartment across the hall from Leonard Hofstadter and Sheldon Cooper. Leonard and Sheldon are both brilliant Physicists. Colleagues, best friends and roommates Leonard and Sheldon have a relationship that is being continuously tested by Sheldon's deeply eccentric and non-convential attitude. They're also friends with their colleagues mechanical engineer Howard Wolowitz and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali. With Penny moving across the hall, Leonard has a new aspiration in life besides physics.(n)

programme.title: The Lost City of Z

programme.title: The Legend of Hercules
programme.desc: In Ancient Greece 1200 B.C., a queen succumbs to the lust of Zeus to bear a son promised to overthrow the tyrannical rule of the king and restore peace to a land in hardship. But this prince, Hercules, knows nothing of his real identity or his destiny. He desires only one thing: the love of Hebe, Princess of Crete, who has been promised to his own brother. When Hercules learns of his greater purpose, he must choose: to flee with his true love or to fulfill his destiny and become the true hero of his time. The story behind one of the greatest myths is revealed in this action-packed epic - a tale of love, sacrifice and the strength of the human spirit.

programme.desc: The epic tale of the heroism of Rani of Jhansi, the Indian queen who became a fearless freedom fighter who led her people into battle against the British Empire in 1857.

programme.title: Gridlocked
programme.desc: David Hendrix is an ex S.W.A.T leader who must join forces with Brody Walker, a movie star shadowing him, as the two try to form the surviving members of a training facility into a team to combat a group of ruthless mercenaries that might just wreak havoc in the whole compound.

programme.desc: Nick Wild is a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal professional skills and a personal gambling problem. When a friend is beaten by a sadistic thug, Nick strikes back, only to find out the thug is the son of a powerful mob boss, dragging Nick into the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Hotel Artemis
programme.desc: During a riot In Los Angeles, 2028, over a decision to privatise the city’s water supply, two brothers fail to rob a bank and get badly wounded by the police. They escape to Hotel Artemis with an underground hospital treating criminals and run by “The Nurse”. The hotel is now full of criminals and a gravely wounded cop who got admitted by The Nurse, in violation of the hotel’s most sacred rule.

Clayton agrees to join the training center. He admires Layla, his skillful colleague and is tasked with finding a spy within the training program.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: Jon knows plenty of women, but seems to prioritize his love for pornography over relationships. He meets Barbara at a nightclub, and she dumps him after she discovers his obsession, and on his quest to find another woman, he meets Esther, who tries to help him with his problem.

programme.title: Hands of Stone
programme.desc: The film revolves around the life of the famous boxer (Roberto Duran), where his career began at a very early age, playing for the world championship of average weight before the global boxer (Sugar Ray Leonard), and during the match surprised all the audience and all the viewers of the game by going to the corner of the ring and saying his famous words (not more).

programme.title: Runaway Bride
programme.desc: Ike Graham is a journalist who usually writes his column attacking the opposite sex, in his last article he wrote about Maggie, famous in her hometown of getting engaged and running away each time at the altar. When Ike is fired for claims of inaccurate story, he decides to find out the truth himself.

programme.title: On the Basis of Sex
programme.desc: The true story of Ruth Bader Ginsburg, as she struggles for equal rights, and the obstacles she had to overcome in order to become a U.S. Supreme Court Associate Justice.

programme.title: We Have Always Lived in the Castle
programme.desc: Merricat, Constance and their uncle Julian live in isolation after suffering a family tragedy six years ago. When their cousin Charles arrives to steal the family's fortune, they are threatened by a dark secret they were hiding.

programme.title: The Recruit
programme.desc: Promising young man James Clayton graduated top of his class. He works in a bar and meets Walter Burke who wants to recruit him for the CIA. Clayton agrees to join the training center. He admires Layla, his skillful colleague and is tasked with finding a spy within the training program.

programme.title: Edward Scissorhands
programme.desc: Edward, a synthetic humanoid, is left with scissors for hands after his inventor dies. As he gets taken in by a kind woman, he ends up taking the fall for a crime he didn't commit, which threatens his place with the family he has come to love.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: As a salesman travels with his partner to a small town to secure drilling rights for a natural-gas company,he decides to help the townspeople to bring back its resources and economy once again with the help of a grassroots campaign.

programme.title: The Girl on the Train
programme.desc: A troubled divorcée gets tangled up in a dangerous web of secrets and lies, after she witnesses something shocking while taking the train.

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Chon Wang is the sheriff of Carson City, Nevada, and his father is the Keeper of the Imperial Seal of China. When his father is murdered, Chon asks his friend Roy to go to London with him, with revenge on their minds.

programme.title: Little Woods
programme.desc: Ollie and Deb are two sisters who are forced to break the law in order to better their lives. When Ollie was about to quit her illegal transfer of medication across the border, she finds herself forced to make one more score.

programme.title: Shadow Dancer
programme.desc: In 1993, the IRA member Colette is arrested and a deal is made for her to work for the MI-5 as an informer. She accepts to protect her son but it not that simple as other tasks are asked by different officers.

programme.title: Thunder Road
programme.desc: Police officer Jim Arnaud suffers from a breakdown after his separation from his wife and the death of his mother.

programme.title: Ordinary Love
programme.desc: A happily married couple faces the ultimate test when the wife is diagnosed with cancer. Over the course of her treatment, the two of them must rely on each other for strength and support.

programme.title: Cinderella Man
programme.desc: The true story of boxer James Braddock, who was a boxing champion in the 1930s until he began to suffer injuries and broke his left hand and became poor in a period where only the rich survive, how will he support himself, wife and three children with a broken hand in the winter.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: Jon knows plenty of women, but seems to prioritize his love for pornography over relationships. He meets Barbara at a nightclub, and she dumps him after she discovers his obsession, and on his quest to find another woman, he meets Esther, who tries to help him with his problem.

programme.title: Shadow Dancer
programme.desc: In 1993, the IRA member Colette is arrested and a deal is made for her to work for the MI-5 as an informer. She accepts to protect her son but it not that simple as other tasks are asked by different officers.

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Chon Wang is the sheriff of Carson City, Nevada, and his father is the Keeper of the Imperial Seal of China. When his father is murdered, Chon asks his friend Roy to go to London with him, with revenge on their minds.

programme.title: The 100-Year-Old Man Who Climbed Out the Window and Disappeared
programme.desc: After living a long and prosperous life, Allan Karlsson now believes that he must start his life again after being confined to a nursing home. On his 100th birthday, he jumps out of the window and embarks on a grand adventure that turns his life upside down.
